title: Trundle
description: Trundle is a travel platform that connects travellers with local travel experts. Imagine you're travelling to Japan in April. You've booked your flights and hotel room. It's time to plan your itinerary. Google searches and scrolling through TripAdvisor gives you generic recommendations. You're looking for inspiring personalised recommendations that are offbeat and unique. That's where Trundle can be useful. On our platform, you can buy curated recommendations directly from local travel experts.
